costDrivers.question: Does SmartCare cost money for drivers?
costDrivers.answer: No. Registration and use of SmartCare for drivers is completely free. You only pay for the services you contract at workshops.

workshopVerification.question: How are workshops verified?
workshopVerification.answer: Each affiliated workshop goes through a validation process. We verify their information, reputation and reviews to ensure you only work with trusted businesses.

citiesAvailable.question: In which cities does SmartCare work?
citiesAvailable.answer: We are currently available in Lima and major cities in Peru. We are progressively expanding coverage to reach more drivers and workshops.

emergencyRoad.question: What happens if I have an emergency on the road?
emergencyRoad.answer: With SmartCare's SOS button, you can ask for help in seconds. We'll connect you with nearby tow trucks and workshops to resolve the situation as quickly as possible.

maintenanceControl.question: Can I keep track of all my maintenance?
maintenanceControl.answer: Yes. SmartCare keeps a digital record of every service performed on your vehicle, so you always have your maintenance information at hand.

workshopFees.question: Does SmartCare charge workshops?
workshopFees.answer: Workshop registration is free. We only apply a commission for each client that comes through the platform, ensuring workshops only pay when they get results.
